index.description: MD index. Its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

md-index.description: MD index. Its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

ma-index.description: MA index. Its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

ccm-interval.description: CCM transmission period indication. 1-7 respectively, corresponding to the period of 3.3ms, 10ms, 100ms, 1s, 10s, 60s and 600s.

name-icc-string.description: MA name. It consists of two subfields: the ITU carrier code (ICC) followed by a unique MAID code (UMC). The ITU Carrier Code consists of 1-6 left-justified characters, alphabetic, or leading alphabetic with trailing numeric. The UMC code immediately follows the ICC and shall consist of 7-12 characters, with trailing NULLs, completing the 13-character MAID Value.

addition-detect-vlans.description: Additional detect VLAN list, VLAN range from [1..4094].

md-index.description: MD index. Its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

ma-index.description: MA index. Its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

direction.description: MEP type. Down MEP: A MEP residing in a Bridge that receives CFM PDUs from, and transmits them towards, the direction of the LAN. Up MEP: A MEP residing in a Bridge that transmits CFM PDUs towards, and receives them from, the direction of the Bridge Relay Entity.

ccm-send.description: Controls the transmission of CCMs. When set to enable, CCMs are transmitted. When set to disable, CCM transmission ceases.

priority.description: The priority parameter for CCMs and LTMs transmitted by the MEP.

ccm-ltm-priority.description: The priority parameter of CCMs and LTMs.

state-dlm.description: The state of proactive dual-ended loss measurement.

oam-count.description: Indicating whether OAM packets are counted. Set true if OAM packets need to be counted, else false.

state-proactive-1dm.description: The state of proactive one-way delay measurements.

state-proactive-dmm.description: The state of proactive two-way delay measurements.

state-proactive-lmm.description: The state of proactive single-ended loss measurements.

oam-count-lmm.description: Indicating whether OAM packets are counted. Set true if OAM packets need to be counted, else false.

bnm-service-policy-adjust.description: The state of BNM adjusting service policy.

statistics-interval.description: The statistics interval, ranges from 1s to 60s(default:15s).
